sentences.en: an inexhaustible supply of good jokes
For twenty years he wrote with seemingly inexhaustible energy.
sentences.cn: 二十年来,他似乎有无尽的精力从事写作.

sentences.en: From them she drew immense comfort and inexhaustible strength.
sentences.cn: 从他们身上,她得到了巨大的安慰,无穷的力量.

sentences.en: His energy was unbounded and his patience inexhaustible.
sentences.cn: 他有无穷的精力和无限的耐心。

sentences.en: Our imponderable resources in knowledge are constantly growing and are inexhaustible.
sentences.cn: 我们无法估量的知识资源是不断发展永不枯竭的.

sentences.en: She has an inexhaustible supply of enthusiasm.
She has an inexhaustible supply of funny stories.
sentences.cn: 她有讲不完的有趣故事。

sentences.en: She seems to have inexhaustible energy.
The inexhaustible possibilities in bridge and chess have fascinated generations of players.
sentences.cn: 桥牌和国际象棋中层出不穷的可能性吸引不少玩棋的人.

sentences.en: The people living beside the river have an inexhaustible supply of water.
sentences.cn: 住在河边的人有取用不尽之水.

sentences.en: The potentialities of the human brain are inexhaustible.
sentences.cn: 人类头脑的潜力是无穷的.

sentences.en: The rivers afford an inexhaustible supply of fish.
sentences.cn: 这几条河有取之不尽的鱼类资源.

sentences.en: The wealth of her graces was inexhaustible -- she beautified the commonest action.
sentences.cn: 她那优美的风度千姿百态, -- 她给最平常的一举一动都赋予一种美感.

sentences.en: The wisdom of the masses is inexhaustible.
The wisdom of the people is inexhaustible.
sentences.cn: 人民的智慧是无穷无尽的.

trans.tran_en: something that is inexhaustible exists in such large amounts that it can never be finished or used up
